track.name: Algorithms
track.descriptions: The true test of problem solving: when one realizes that time and memory aren't infinite.

primary_contest.description:
Represent your country. Solve Challenges. Win prizes and get discovered by Companies.

Join thousands of coders in World CodeSprint 7 to prove your skills and win a World Champion Shirt. Top performers will be introduced to sponsoring companies looking to hire. You’ll have 48 hours to solve 8 algorithm challenges. See you on the leaderboard!
primary_contest.name: World CodeSprint 7

model.preview: Find the maximum possible length of elastic rope.
model.name: Elastic rope
